references.paper_title: Score jacobian chaining: Lifting pretrained 2d diffusion models for 3d generation
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach for using pre-trained 2D diffusion models for 3D generation, which addresses the limitations of previous methods and is directly relevant to Director3D's approach.
This work tackles the challenge of scene-level 3D generation using multi-view diffusion, and its approach to modeling multi-view consistency is similar to the one taken by Director3D.

references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting, a key representation technique used by Director3D for efficient 3D scene representation and rendering.

references.paper_title: Zero-shot text-guided object generation with dream fields
references.reason: This paper explores the use of score distillation sampling for optimizing 3D representations from text prompts, a technique that inspired and is related to the SDS++ loss refinement used by Director3D.
